articles.title: Adding extra salt to food leads to higher risk of early death, UK-American study finds - Kildare Live
articles.description: People who add extra salt to their food at the table are at higher risk of dying early from any cause, according to a UK-American study. The research, involving more than 500,000 people, found that those who always add salt to their food have a 28% increased …
articles.content:
People who add extra salt to their food at the table are at higher risk of dying early from any cause, according to a UK-American study.
